DataElement.preferredName: Epworth Sleepiness Scale Questionnaire How Likely Doze or Fall Asleep Sitting and Talking to Someone Score 4 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how likely they are to doze off or fall asleep while sitting and talking to someone, using a four point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Epworth Sleepiness Scale Questionnaire How Likely Doze or Fall Asleep Sitting and Talking to Someone Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A standardized rating scale used to assess an individual's general level of daytime sleepiness._Having a good chance of being the case or of coming about._A question about the likelihood an individual would doze or fall asleep._A question about an individual's activity of sitting and talking to someone._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A standardized rating scale used to assess an individual's general level of daytime sleepiness.

Concepts.definition: A standardized rating scale used to assess an individual's general level of daytime sleepiness.

Property.preferredName: Likely Doze or Fall Asleep Sitting and Talking to Someone Score
Property.preferredDefinition: Having a good chance of being the case or of coming about.:A question about the likelihood an individual would doze or fall asleep.:A question about an individual's activity of sitting and talking to someone.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: Having a good chance of being the case or of coming about.
A question about an individuals likelihood to doze or fall asleep.
A question about an individual's activity of sitting and talking to someone.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Having a good chance of being the case or of coming about._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability._A natural number greater than 3 and less than 5 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of three and one._The precise location of something; a spatially limited location._an ordered reference standard.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A question about whether an individual has or had a high likelihood of dozing.

Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual has or had a high likelihood of dozing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A question about whether an individual has or had a moderate likelihood of dozing.

Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual has or had a moderate likelihood of dozing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A question about whether an individual has or had a slight likelihood of dozing.

Concepts.definition: A question about whether an individual has or had a slight likelihood of dozing.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A question about the likelihood an individual would never doze.

Concepts.definition: A question about the likelihood an individual would never doze.
